name: Counter-Strike 2
description: Competitive FPS server with custom map support.

name: Minecraft
description: Host modded or vanilla servers with full plugin support.

name: Rust
description: A multiplayer survival game where players must gather resources, build shelters, and survive against the environment and each other.

description: A sandbox game about engineering, construction, exploration, and survival in space and on planets.

name: Valheim
description: Viking co-op survival in a procedurally generated world.

name: More Games
description: We're working on supporting even more titles. Stay tuned!
